Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Interfaces
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Constructors
  • Deprecated Annotation Type Elements
  • Deprecated Interfaces 
    Interface and Description
    picocli.CommandLine.IExceptionHandler
    Use CommandLine.IExceptionHandler2 instead.
    picocli.CommandLine.IParseResultHandler
    Use CommandLine.IParseResultHandler2 instead.
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    picocli.CommandLine.Help.addSubcommand(String, Object) 
    picocli.CommandLine.Help.Ansi.Text.append(CommandLine.Help.Ansi.Text)
    use #concat(Text) instead
    picocli.CommandLine.Help.Ansi.Text.append(String)
    use CommandLine.Help.Ansi.Text.concat(String) instead
    picocli.CommandLine.Help.TextTable.cellAt(int, int)
    use CommandLine.Help.TextTable.textAt(int, int) instead
    picocli.CommandLine.Range.defaultArity(Class<?>)
    use CommandLine.Range.defaultArity(Field) instead
    picocli.CommandLine.Help.detailedSynopsis(Comparator<CommandLine.Model.OptionSpec>, boolean)
    use CommandLine.Help.detailedSynopsis(int, Comparator, boolean) instead.
    picocli.CommandLine.Model.OptionSpec.help()
    Use CommandLine.Model.OptionSpec.usageHelp() and CommandLine.Model.OptionSpec.versionHelp() instead.
    picocli.CommandLine.Model.OptionSpec.Builder.help()
    Use CommandLine.Model.OptionSpec.Builder.usageHelp() and CommandLine.Model.OptionSpec.Builder.versionHelp() instead.
    picocli.CommandLine.parseWithHandler(CommandLine.IParseResultHandler, PrintStream, String...)
    use CommandLine.parseWithHandler(IParseResultHandler2, String[]) instead
    picocli.CommandLine.parseWithHandlers(CommandLine.IParseResultHandler, PrintStream, CommandLine.Help.Ansi, CommandLine.IExceptionHandler, String...)
    use CommandLine.parseWithHandlers(IParseResultHandler2, IExceptionHandler2, String...) instead
    picocli.CommandLine.printHelpIfRequested(List<CommandLine>, PrintStream, CommandLine.Help.Ansi)
    use CommandLine.printHelpIfRequested(List, PrintStream, PrintStream, Help.Ansi) instead
    picocli.CommandLine.Model.ArgSpec.setValue(T, CommandLine)
    use CommandLine.Model.ArgSpec.setValue(Object) instead. This was a design mistake.
    picocli.CommandLine.Help.synopsis()
    use CommandLine.Help.synopsis(int) instead
  • Deprecated Constructors 
    Constructor and Description
    picocli.CommandLine.Help(Object, CommandLine.Help.ColorScheme)
    use picocli.CommandLine.Help#Help(picocli.CommandLine.Model.CommandSpec, picocli.CommandLine.Help.ColorScheme)
  • Deprecated Annotation Type Elements 
    Annotation Type Element and Description
    picocli.CommandLine.Option.help
    Use CommandLine.Option.usageHelp() and CommandLine.Option.versionHelp() instead. See CommandLine.printHelpIfRequested(List, PrintStream, CommandLine.Help.Ansi)
